mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT AA.SALE_CNT,BB.STORED_NAME,AA.PRO_NAME,AA.PRO_CONTENT,AA.PRO_SEQ,AA.PRO_PRICE FROM (SELECT COUNT(A.PRO_SEQ) SALE_CNT, B.PRO_NAME, B.PRO_CONTENT, B.PRO_SEQ, B.PRO_PRICE FROM SALES A INNER JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.PRO_SEQ=B.PRO_SEQ WHERE B.ITEM=#{ITEM} GROUP BY A.PRO_SEQ,B.PRO_NAME,B.PRO_CONTENT,B.PRO_SEQ,B.PRO_PRICE ORDER BY SALE_CNT DESC) AA LEFT OUTER JOIN PHOTO BB ON AA.PRO_SEQ=BB.PRO_SEQ WHERE BB.STORED_NAME LIKE '%MAIN%' ORDER BY SALE_CNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <=3
SELECT SUB_ITEM FROM PRODUCT WHERE ITEM=#{ITEM} GROUP BY SUB_ITEM
